title: Stunning Rittenhouse 3 Bedroom with Large Yard
description:

The second floor has 2 bedrooms and a shared bathroom. The third floor is dedicated to the stunning primary bedroom with vaulted ceilings and a recently remodeled en-suite bathroom.
No Pets Allowed. 12 Month Minimum Lease

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

title: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium
description: This is an elegant entry vestibule unit at The Lenox Condominium, one of the best pre-war buildings in the city. It also has one of the nicest layouts at the Lenox. It is a SE corner unit on a high floor with lots of windows, including 3 bay windows, great light and fantastic views. This unit is the largest one-bedroom in the building and has the same square footage as most two bedrooms units. The vestibule, large rooms and high ceilings give the home a grand look and feel. One side of the vestibule leads to a spacious living room with built in bookcases and two bay windows, a formal dining room and a beautiful kitchen. The fully renovated kitchen includes custom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, ceramic tile flooring and granite countertops. The other side of the vestibule has a huge bedroom that has a den, built in bookcases, walk-in-closet and a bay window. The master bedroom has a closet organizing system. The home has a split unit air conditioning system. The Lenox was designed by famed New York architects Clinton and Russell. It was built in 1920 and renovated into condos in 2004-5. The units have large scale rooms, high ceilings, lots of windows and most units have many of their original architectural elements. It is a doorman building and is centrally located at the southern end of Mid-town Village in Washington Square West. It is two blocks from the great shops, restaurants, theatres, Kimmel Center and night life of Midtown Village, Walnut Street and the Avenue of the Arts. It is also just a few blocks from Thomas Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. There are many gym, parking and public transportation options nearby. The Lenox has a large central laundry room, but the association now allows owners to install individual units within owner condos, with some restrictions and installation requirements.

title: Historic Building , Hardwood Floors, Elevator Building
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
